about_the_game:
Skykipelago is a chill building strategy game where you build happy little cities in the sky. Explore a variety of colorful islands, care for your buildings' happiness, evolve your buildings to help you grow, and when solid ground is no longer cool enough for you - expand onto the cliff sides.

If you're looking for a simple, all building, no resource management style of experience, Skykipelago is here for you. Intuitive gameplay will have you creating sprawling island cities in no time, leaving you free to enjoy the relaxing atmosphere... or puzzle out how to get the sweetest combos; whatever floats your airboat.

Expand onto the cliff sides

Here at Indie Games Starter, we believe in equal opportunity building: be it a horizontal or vertical surface, here in the skies it's all free real estate. Flex your engineering prowess as you commit the worst architectural crimes known to man- Uhhh, I mean: build perfectly respectable floating little cities, yes.

It's buildings all the way down

You know what would look good on top of those buildings? Even more buildings. Ground is sparse in the sky, so we're gonna make the best use of what we've got! And that means that a house is a perfect place to build a house or at least a little rooftop garden.

Happy little buildings help you prosper

Happy little cities is where all the cool buildings want to be! So place your buildings with an eye towards their preferred surroundings and watch those sweetly satisfying points combos make it easier than ever to build your little sky metropolis.

Evolve your buildings to best match your city

Some buildings, well, they just aren't done growing yet. You decide whether they'll stay their same old selves, or turn into something that's just a little bit extra. And if you play your cards right that extra will let you make your city even bigger!

Delve into the Skykipelago storyline!

In Campaign Mode, you must embark on a quest to save your people as you take on the formidable role of U'vatar, a powerful guardian equipped with the ability to reconstruct the prosperous Skykipelago. Guide your people with your divine wisdom towards a bright future!

Features:

  • balance the needs of all your buildings so that your city can happily thrive in Score Mode

  • focus even more of the buldings' happiness in Happiness Mode

  • let your creativity thrive in Sandbox Mode

  • build parts of your city on cliff walls

  • build on the roofs to optimize space even more!

  • figure out how to evolve certain buildings to help you thrive

  • enjoy intuitive gameplay, and depth when you're ready for it
